mapper.select: with recursive orgaTree(orga_no, tree_name, gno, ord, depth) as ( select o1.orga_no , tc.company_name , tc.company_no , ifnull(o1.upper_orga_no, 0) as ord , ifnull(o1.upper_orga_no, 0) as depth from tbl_orga o1 join tbl_company tc on o1.orga_no = tc.orga_no union all select o2.orga_no , td.dept_name , td.gno , td.ord , td.depth from orgaTree ot1 join tbl_orga o2 on o2.upper_orga_no = ot1.orga_no join tbl_dept_mapping tdm on o2.orga_no = tdm.orga_no join tbl_dept td on td.dept_no = tdm.dept_no ) select orga_no, tree_name, gno, ord, depth from orgaTree ot2 order by ot2.gno, ot2.ord;
